description: A comprehensive React-based utility toolbox providing file converters, calculators, and digital tools with professional-grade functionality
target_users: Professionals, students, and developers needing quick access to utility tools
business_objectives: Provide high-quality file conversion capabilities using WebAssembly
Deliver accurate calculation tools for various mathematical operations
Offer digital utilities that enhance productivity
Ensure cross-browser compatibility and responsive design

functional_requirements.description: Support video, audio, image, and document file format conversions
acceptance_criteria: Convert video files between MP4, WEBM, AVI, MOV, MKV formats
Convert audio files between MP3, WAV, OGG, AAC, FLAC formats
Convert image files between PNG, JPEG, WebP, GIF formats
Process multiple files in batch mode
Provide real-time conversion progress tracking
Support basic arithmetic operations with high precision
Provide scientific calculator functions (trigonometry, logarithms)
Calculate compound interest and financial metrics
Handle edge cases and invalid inputs gracefully
Convert temperature between Celsius, Fahrenheit, Kelvin
Convert length between metric and imperial units
Convert mass between different weight units
Convert time units accurately
Support additional units: current, substance amount, luminous intensity
Generate QR codes from text/URLs
Create secure passwords with customizable criteria
Provide color picker with format conversion
Support YouTube video URL processing

functional_requirements.description: Deliver intuitive and accessible user experience
acceptance_criteria: Responsive design works on desktop, tablet, and mobile
Dark/light theme toggle with persistence
Keyboard navigation support
Clear loading states and progress indicators
Comprehensive error handling with user feedback

functional_requirements.description: Optimize for fast loading and efficient processing
acceptance_criteria: Initial page load under 3 seconds
File conversions complete within reasonable timeframes
Memory usage remains stable during operations
CDN fallbacks ensure reliable resource loading

technical_requirements.description: Use modern web technologies for optimal performance
specification: Vite 7.1.2 for fast development and building
All processing done locally (no server uploads)
CDN resources loaded over HTTPS only

metrics: Clear visual feedback for all user actions
Consistent design patterns across all components
99%+ success rate for supported file conversions
Accurate calculations verified against known results
Graceful handling of edge cases and errors
No data loss during conversion processes

requirements: Support files up to 100MB without performance degradation
Handle up to 10 simultaneous file conversions
